summary: "Dawn of the Dead" (2004) is a zombie action-horror movie directed by Zack Snyder. It's a remake of the 1978 film, following survivors trying to stay alive in a shopping mall during a zombie apocalypse. The movie stars Sarah Polley and Ving Rhames. Producers wanted to make the zombie genre exciting again, so they hired James Gunn to write the script and Snyder to direct, focusing on realism. It was filmed in a real shopping mall in Toronto. The movie was a hit, making over $100 million worldwide, but some critics felt it was too gory and lacked character development.
title: Dawn of the Dead (2004 film)
